Drop folder here or click to select: Jefa babban fayil a nan ko danna don zaɓi
Click the button below or drag a folder: Danna maɓallin da ke ƙasa ko ja babban fayil a nan
No folder selected: Babu babban fayil da aka zaɓa
No images found in selected folder and s: Ba a sami hotuna a cikin babban fayil da aka zaɓa da ƙananan fayiloli
Babu hotuna don nunawa. Zaɓi babban fayil.
Try using B, V, H, R, and G keys to expe: Yi ƙoƙarin amfani da maɓallan B, V, H, R da G don gwada tasirin akan tambari.
All images have been viewed. Starting ov: Duk hotunan an duba su. Ana fara daga farko.
Press Space to start new session: Danna Space don fara zaman sabo
File is already deleted or inaccessible: Fayil an riga an share shi ko ba za a iya samun shi ba
Are you sure you want to move the file t: Ka tabbata cewa kana son matsar da fayil zuwa shara?
Failed to move file to trash: An gaza matsar da fayil zuwa shara
Cannot open file: Ba za a iya buɗe fayil ba
Babu wasu hotuna da za a iya tsallakewa zuwa gare su.
No more valid images found in the folder: Ba a sami ƙarin hotuna masu inganci a cikin babban fayil.
No images available to skip to: Babu hotuna da za a iya tsallakewa zuwa gare su
About GestArt Text:
GestArt mai kallo ne na hotuna wanda aka ƙera don taimakawa masu fasaha suyi aiki da zanen hannu, zana matsayi, da kallon hotunan tunani.

Shekaru da yawa, na yi amfani da wani shirin kuma ban gamsu da shi ba a wasu fannoni. Gaskiyar ita ce, ban san yin coding da kaina ba. Na shafe watanni da yawa ina yaƙi da AI, wanda sau da yawa yakan lalata shirin gaba ɗaya, amma yanzu kuna da wannan shirin wanda AI ya rubuta bisa ra'ayina. An yanke shawarar sanya shirin ya zama open-source gaba ɗaya, kyauta don amfani, rarrabawa, da gyara.

Yabo: Ra'ayi - LeonWGal; Code - Cursor; Sautin ƙidaya - Mixkit; Alamomi - Tabler

A ƙasa akwai hanyoyin haɗin gwiwa na inda za ku iya tuntube ni ko tallafa mini. Dole ne in yi muku gargaɗi cewa ni mai fasaha ne na NSFW da farko, don haka ku kasance masu hankali.
Instructions Text:
Sarrafawa na asali:
• Space - Tsaya/Ci gaba da timer
• Kibiyoyi hagu/dama - Hoto na baya/na gaba
• S - Tsallake hoton yanzu
• Delete - Matsar da hoton yanzu zuwa shara

Sarrafa hoto:
• Ƙugiya na linzami ko +/- - Ƙara ciki/fita
• Danna da ja - Pan lokacin da aka ƙara
• B - Tace baki da fari
• V - Juyar da tsaye
• H - Juyar da kwance
• R - Juya 90°
• Backspace - Sake saita duk tasirin hoto

Siffofi na ƙari:
• G - Canza grid na tsari
• T - Nuna/Boye timer
• A - Canza 'Koyaushe a saman'
• O - Buɗe hoton yanzu
• C - Kwafi hoto zuwa clipboard
• Ctrl+, - Buɗe saituna
